short_summary: Request for Information – Flight Deck Motion System for Royal Canadian Navy Helicopter Carrying Ships
description: Request for Information – Flight Deck Motion System for Royal Canadian Navy Helicopter Carrying Ships This RFI is neither a call for tender nor a Request for Proposal (RFP). No agreement or contract will be entered into based on this RFI. The issuance of this RFI is not to be considered in any way a commitment by the Government of Canada, nor as authority to potential Respondents to undertake any work that could be charged to Canada. This RFI is not to be considered as a commitment to issue a subsequent solicitation or award contract(s) for the work described herein. "].join(
